title: Alsek River
whats_it_like: One of the most spectacular northern wilderness trips in the world.  Challenging logistics, epic glaciers.
scouting_portaging: Easy, except if you can't run Turnback Canyon then you face one of the most grueling portages out there.                                  It's a 6 km, day long hike over the terminal moraine of the Tweedsmuir Glacier.

time.original: 8-10 days (depends on how much hiking and exploring you want to do).

when_to_go: September or October if you want to attempt the canyon.  You need cold and dry weather. If you commit to                       portaging Turnback, go in July-September.
